text: San Marino competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Ten competitors, eight men and two women, took part in seven events in three sports. ==Athletics== ==Cycling== One cyclist represented San Marino in 1976. ;Individual road race * Daniele Cesaretti -- did not finish (→ no ranking) ==Shooting== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1976 Summer Olympics 1976 Summer Olympics Summer Olympics
title: San Marino at the 1976 Summer Olympics
